LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasic.label: plastic basic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasic.description: Lightweight bio-plastic from plant materials. Basic-grade material suitable for simple furniture and structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrial.label: plastic industrial
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrial.description: Advanced bio-plastic with enhanced durability. Industrial-grade material for high-quality furniture and robust structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteel.label: plastic bio-steel
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteel.description: Advanced bio-engineered steel created by reinforcing plant-based polymers with metallic compounds. While not as strong as spacer-tech materials, it offers an excellent balance of durability and sustainability for colonial construction.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiber.label: plastic fiber
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiber.description: Synthetic textile fiber from bio-plastic. Suitable for clothing production and textile crafting.
LanguageData.RSF_WoodPlanks.label: wood planks
LanguageData.RSF_WoodPlanks.description: Useful for building structures and weapons. Good fuel for campfires and generators, and can be refined into chemfuel.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiary.label: incendiary plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiary.description: Bio-plastic infused with volatile compounds. Extremely flammable construction material for tactical applications. Handle with care.
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeather.label: eco leather
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeather.description: Synthetic leather from plant polymers. Sustainable alternative to animal leather for high-quality clothing.
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampMini.label: mini sun lamp
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampMini.description: A mini sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a considerable amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampTiny.label: tiny sun lamp 1x1
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampTiny.description: A tiny sun lamp 1x1 which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a moderate amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampCompact.label: compact sun lamp 1x3
LanguageData.RSF_SunLampCompact.description: A compact sun lamp 1x3 which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a moderate amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasin.label: crop basin
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasin.description: A simple basin for growing crops indoors without electricity.
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasinTiny.label: tiny crop basin 1x1
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasinTiny.description: A tiny crop basin 1x1 for growing crops indoors without electricity.
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasinCompact.label: compact crop basin 1x3
LanguageData.RSF_CropBasinCompact.description: A compact basin 1x3 for growing crops indoors without electricity.
LanguageData.RSF_TreeBasinTiny.label: tiny tree basin 1x1
LanguageData.RSF_TreeBasinTiny.description: A tiny basin 1x1 for growing tree indoors without electricity.
LanguageData.RSF_ChemFuelStove.label: chemfuel stove
LanguageData.RSF_ChemFuelStove.description: A Chemfuel-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
